mapper.select: select a.*, (select b.username from sa_user b where b.guid = a.userguid) username from sa_user_work_folder a where a.userguid = #USERGUID# and a.foldertype = #FOLDERTYPE#
mapper.insert: insert into sa_user_work_folder ( guid, userguid, foldertype, folderpath ) select #GUID:VARCHAR#, #USERGUID:VARCHAR#, #FOLDERTYPE:VARCHAR#, #FOLDERPATH:VARCHAR#
mapper.update: update sa_user_work_folder set folderpath = #FOLDERPATH# where userguid = #USERGUID# and foldertype = #FOLDERTYPE#
